title: lam1
author: lam1
content: Author   Topic: USDT To Earn - 5000$ USDT REWARD POOL   (Read 9296 times)BountyDetective (OP)Full Member***Activity: 218Merit: 120View Profile Personal Message (Offline)Trust: +3 / =1 / -1Ignore   USDT To Earn - 5000$ STN REWARD POOL Reply with quote  #1★ WEBSITE ★ TELEGRAM ★ TWITTER ★ DISCORD ★ FACEBOOK ★ APP STORE ★ PLAY STORE ★____________________________________________STN will be listed on,____________________________________________1. The Bounty campaign will be managed by Bounty Detective. 2. 500,000 STN are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst selected participants.3. The bounty program was launched on April 6th, 2023 and will run until May 24th, 2023.4. The reward distribution of Stretch To Earn Bounty is guaranteed by Bounty Detective.The distribution will begin at the end of June, 2023.______________________Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed.Bounty Detective may perform additional reviews, including but not limited to requesting other documentation for analysis of your joinedcampaigns if needed.Bounty Detective is under no obligation to send your bounty reward and may, at its discretion, cancel your participation from each ongoingbounty if the participant does not follow the rules mentioned on this bounty thread.Bounty Detective has no contribution to the token distribution; unless it announces the exact opposite on group and channel. We are onlyresponsible for the reward distribution of any campaign when we publish it, unless explicitly stated "Bounty Detective hasescrowed and guarantees the reward distribution of this bounty."The USD value of the bounty reward pool is estimated, and it might change regarding different factors. We usually announce the rewards bycalculating their final token sale price if it is not listed on any exchange yet.Our team has carefully researched the project following several criteria as we did for all of the campaigns we have managed or published.However, we can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We areresponsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity.A crypto project has too many factors in reaching their targets. We are not in the team of any project and not their employees, and we can'tguarantee the future progress of any project only because we manage their bounty as freelancers. We encourage everyone to do their research and due diligence before investing their time or money. Participating in this bountycampaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Kind regards.______________________1. All participants must join Stretch To Earn's official Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, YouTube and CoinMarketCap.2. All participants must join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter and YouTube Channel.3. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign andan instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty Detective's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty programimmediately and all your accounts will be banned permanently. Brand new accounts are not allowed to join.7. Participants with a minimum of 100+ activity counts on Bitcointalk will be eligible to join the social media campaigns,while 30+ activity counts on the article campaign.8. Participants can not change their wallet address after registration. Please double check your wallet address beforeregistration for any campaign.9. Participants’ forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the Article and Video campaign.10. Article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.11. Negative Trusted Accounts may be allowed into this Campaign if the reason for red trust is libel or unjustifiable.Final Decision is at the Bounty manager's discretion if you have a massively red trusted account or acquiretoo many negatives during the campaign, you accept the risk that you might be eventually removed and your stakes voided.12. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.13. All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculatedon a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:Weekly Report Format:Code:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:CoinMarketCap Username:Screenshot of your follow-up of STN on CMC:: (To demonstrate that you are following cmc, please take a screenshot and upload the URL using imgur)Twitter CampaignTwitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet No:Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …Telegram CampaignTelegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Telegram posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …Twitter           40%Telegram       30%Article            30%Note: Due to the bounty duration and pool, we have limited the number of participants for this bounty.Twitter:  First 500 approved participants.Telegram: First 100 approved participants.Article: Top 70 articles will be selected.--> Please submit your weekly report on this bounty thread <--Week 1 (06.04 - 12.04)Week 2 (13.04 - 19.04)►Week 3 (20.04 - 26.04)◄Week 4 (27.04 - 03.05)Week 5 (04.05 - 10.05)Week 6 (11.05 - 17.05)Week 7 (18.05 - 24.05)--> If you have any problem regarding missing stakes, please fill the form below <--Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked once in every week.Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow Stretch To Earn’s Twitter Page and CoinMarketCap.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use $STN #StretchToEarn  #BSC#NFT hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join Stretch To Earn’s official YouTube, CoinMarketCap and Telegram Group.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter and YouTube.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/cLuBei67scByAt959Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Every participant must follow Stretch To Earn’s Telegram and CoinMarketCap.2. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | Stretch To Earn.(Example: BountyDetective | Stretch To Earn)3. Replace your profile picture with Stretch To Earn's Logo.4. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.5. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.6. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc). Posting messages on other groups won’t be counted.7. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.8. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.9. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.10. You must wear Stretch To Earn's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.How to join:1. Join USDT To Earn’s official YouTube, CoinMarketCap and Telegram Group.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter and YouTube.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/ttYQXf4c4zHt64Jy8Rewards:  High quality: 3 stakesGood quality: 2 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Every participant must follow Stretch To Earn’s YouTube and CoinMarketCap.2. Each participant can write 1 article only.3. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.4. High engagements but poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awardedbased on quality and the number of engagements with other criteria.5. Quality articles with less or no engagements will be rewarded accordingly.6. Participants' forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.7. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.8. Content must focus on a relevant topic: Project features, Staking / Liquidity rewards, Presale,Latest project's token updates, Blockchain, etc.9. Only quality and original content will be accepted. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.10. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.11. Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!12. By joining this program, participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join Stretch To Earn’s official YouTube, CoinMarketCap and Telegram Group.2. Join Bounty Detective's Telegram Group, Telegram Channel, Twitter and YouTube.3. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/7iwvkt7kkJKoEcnf9Activity: 476Merit: 0View Profile Personal Message (Offline)Trust: +0 / =0 / -0Ignore   [/s][/b][/glow][/color]
